description: In-class test with short-answer questions and mini-essays assessing understanding of natural selection and evolutionary concepts from the first half of the course. Conducted in week 5 during class time.

Individual essay analyzing a contemporary news story (post-June 2022) through an evolutionary lens. Requires explaining evolutionary concepts to a non-specialist audience, including title, key concepts, sources, references, and a 1500-word body. Emphasizes clear writing and critical analysis.
60-minute written examination during the formal exam period, testing knowledge of evolutionary concepts from the second half of the course. Includes short-answer questions and mini-essays.
